achievementsPage.title: Game Achievements
achievementsPage.selectGamePrompt: Select a game from the "Search" tab to view its achievements.
achievementsPage.noAchievements: No achievements found for this game.
achievementsPage.loadingError: Could not load achievements for this game.

searchPage.error: An error occurred during the search. Please try again later.
searchPage.initialStatePrompt: Use the search bar above to find games on Steam.
searchPage.delistedHint: Tip: For games removed from the store, search using the AppID directly.

exportPage.cooldown: Export is on cooldown. Please wait.

unlockModal.title: Select unlock directory
unlockModal.description: Choose where the achievements for {gameName} will be unlocked.
unlockModal.overwriteWarning: A file already exists for this game here and will be overwritten.
unlockModal.steamCustomTimestampWarning: When unlocking through Steam, a custom timestamp is not applied. The final unlock time is managed by Steam servers.

directorySelectionModal.title: Select directory for {gameName}
directorySelectionModal.description: This game was found in multiple directories. Choose which one to use for unlocking achievements.

api.title: API Settings
api.description: Select the data source to get game and achievement information.
api.steamDescription: Requires a personal Steam API key. Offers official data and higher reliability.
api.hydraDescription: No API key required. An alternative community-maintained data source.
api.apiKeyInvalidLength: The API key must be 32 characters long.
api.apiKeyInvalidFormat: The API key must contain only hexadecimal characters (0-9, A-F).
api.steamIntegrationDescription: Automatically detect and display games from your Steam library alongside your local games.
api.steamIntegrationBetaNotice: Beta feature: it may be unstable for some games and environments.
api.steamIntegrationWarning: Steam integration requires Steam API to be selected. Select Steam API above to enable this feature.
api.steamIntegrationRequiresSteamApi: This feature is only available when using Steam API as the data source.
api.steamIntegrationMissingWarning: Steam libraries could not be detected or the Steam client is not running. This feature will be disabled until necessary components are found.
api.steamNotRunningToastMessage: Open the Steam client and make sure you're logged in. Then return to Settings > API and try enabling Steam Integration again.
api.forceFrontendFetchDescription: Bypasses the app backend and fetches data directly from the browser using a proxy. Useful if the backend is blocked by a firewall or network issues.

language.title: Language & Region
language.description: Choose the application language and the date and time format.

timeFormatWarning.title: Time Format Change
timeFormatWarning.description: Changing the time format may cause visual inconsistencies in open windows. We recommend saving and restarting the application for a better experience.
timeFormatWarning.bugsWarning: Minor visual bugs may occur until restart.

monitored.title: Monitored Directories
monitored.description: The app scans these folders for game achievements. Add your Steam library or compatdata folders here.
monitored.noDirectories: No directories are currently being monitored.
monitored.winePrefixDescription: Set the Wine/Proton prefix root (without /drive_c). The app uses this path to resolve default achievement directories.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: Create .ham backups of your current achievements and restore them with conflict preview.
backup.includeSettingsDesc: Saves your app preferences and monitored paths together with achievements.
backup.restoreStats: Backup: {backup} • Current: {existing} • Same IDs: {overlap} • To replace: {changed}
backup.willReplace: This restore will replace existing achievement data.
backup.conflictsSelected: {count} selected entries will replace existing data

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look of the app according to your preferences.
appearance.resetSidebarWidthDesc: Restores the sidebar to its default width.
appearance.sizeLargeDesc: Larger text and images for better visibility.
appearance.sidebarMarqueeDesc: If a game name is too long, it will scroll to show the full text.
appearance.viewModeDesc: Choose between grid or list view for your library.
appearance.hideHiddenAchievementsDesc: When enabled, achievements flagged as hidden show a "Hidden Achievement" overlay until they are unlocked.

paths.title: Unlock Paths
paths.description: Manage default and custom directories for unlocking achievements.
paths.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this path? This action cannot be undone.

updates.title: Updates
updates.description: Check for new versions of Project HAM and see what has changed.
updates.upToDate: You already have the latest version.

about.title: About Project HAM
about.description: A tool to manage and export your game achievements.

wizard.welcomeDesc: Track and manage your game achievements with ease. Let's get everything ready for you.
